comment: The tactically prudent thing for the White Right to do is sit out this midterm. A faction which delivers votes for a coalition that's actively and openly screwing it while blowing off its promises surrenders its potential influence. I voted for a White Duterte, and all I got was this Orange Jeb.
amr:
# ::snt The tactically prudent thing for the White Right to do is sit out this midterm. A faction which delivers votes for a coalition that's actively and openly screwing it while blowing off its promises surrenders its potential influence. I voted for a White Duterte, and all I got was this Orange Jeb.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / do-02
            :ARG0 (r / right-05
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG1-of (w / white-02)))
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :mod (p2 / prudent
                        :mod (t2 / tactical)))
            :time (m2 / mid-term
                  :mod (t3 / this)))
      :snt2 (s / surprise-01
            :ARG0 (f / faction
                  :ARG0-of (d2 / deliver-01
                        :ARG1 (v / vote-01
                              :ARG1 (c / coalition
                                    :ARG0-of (s2 / screw-02
                                          :ARG1-of (a / activity-06
                                                :ARG0 c)
                                          :ARG1-of (o / open-04
                                                :ARG0 c)
                                          :time (b / blow-off-05
                                                :ARG0 c
                                                :ARG1 t
                                                :ARG2-of (p3 / promise-01
                                                      :ARG0 c)))
                                    :ARG1-of s2))))
            :ARG1 (ii / influence-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :mod (p4 / potential)))
      :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
      :snt3 (a2 / and
            :op1 (v2 / vote-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 (p5 / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Duterte")
                        :ARG1-of (w2 / white-02)))
            :op2 (g / get-02
                  :ARG0 ii3
                  :ARG1 (p6 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Orange"
                              :op2 "Jeb")
                        :mod t3))
            :mod (a3 / all)))

comment: Name calling doesn't do anything intelligent or helpful
amr:
# ::snt Name calling doesn't do anything intelligent or helpful
(d / do-02
      :polarity -
      :ARG0 (c / call-01
            :ARG1 (n / name))
      :ARG1 (a / anything
            :ARG1-of (ii / intelligent-01)
            :ARG0-of (h / helpful-04)))

comment: The N word and R word are highly offensive.   All ethnicities and social groups deserve tolerance.
amr:
# ::snt The N word and R word are highly offensive.   All ethnicities and social groups deserve tolerance.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (w / word
                        :mod (s / string-entity
                              :value "N"))
                  :op2 (w2 / word
                        :mod (s2 / string-entity
                              :value "R")))
            :degree (h / high-02))
      :snt2 (d / deserve-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (e / ethnic-group)
                  :op2 (g / group
                        :mod (s3 / society))
                  :mod (a3 / all))
            :ARG1 (t / tolerate-01)))

comment: The n word is unacceptable. Do not use that term please.
amr:
# ::snt The n word is unacceptable. Do not use that term please.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a / accept-01
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :mod (s / string-entity
                              :value "n"))))
      :snt2 (u / use-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (t / term
                  :mod (t2 / that))))
